languages.text: {n}Молодая женщина смотрит на вас во все глаза, нервно оправляя форму.{/n} "Ваша... Светлость? Прошу прощения, если обращаюсь к вам не по чину! Вы прибыли от губернатора Медины или просто по делам? Если второе — вам следует знать, что в местной тюрьме мятеж, тут весьма опасно!"

{n}The young woman stares at you, adjusting her uniform nervously.{/n} "Your... {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? A thousand pardons if I addressed you improperly! Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодая женщина смотрит на вас во все глаза, нервно оправляя форму.{/n} "Ваша... Светлость? Прошу прощения, если обращаюсь к вам не по чину! Вы прибыли от губернатора Медины или просто по делам? Если второе — вам следует знать, что в местной тюрьме мятеж, тут весьма опасно!"

Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or do you have other business here? If it's the latter, you ought to know that there has been a riot at the local prison. It's dangerous here!"

Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

{n}The young woman stares at you, adjusting her uniform nervously.{/n} "Your... {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? A thousand pardons if I addressed you improperly! Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

languages.text: {n}La joven mujer te observa, enderezándose el uniforme, agitada.{/n} «¿Mi... {mf|milord|milady}? ¡Le ruego que me disculpe si me he dirigido de manera inadecuada! ¿Ha venido en nombre del gobernador Medineh o está aquí por otro motivo? Eh... Si es lo segundo, debería saber que se ha producido un motín en la prisión local. ¡Aquí corre peligro!».
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman stares at you, adjusting her uniform nervously.{/n} "Your... {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? A thousand pardons if I addressed you improperly! Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La joven mujer te observa, enderezándose el uniforme, agitada.{/n} «¿Mi... {mf|milord|milady}? ¡Le ruego que me disculpe si me he dirigido de manera inadecuada! ¿Ha venido en nombre del gobernador Medineh o está aquí por otro motivo? Eh... Si es lo segundo, debería saber que se ha producido un motín en la prisión local. ¡Aquí corre peligro!».

languages.text: {n}Die junge Frau starrt dich an und richtet sich nervös die Uniform.{/n} "Euer ... {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Ich bitte eintausend Mal um Entschuldigung, wenn ich Euch falsch angesprochen habe! Kommt Ihr im Auftrag von Gouverneur Medineh oder führen Euch andere Angelegenheiten her? Äh ... Falls es Letzteres ist, solltet Ihr wissen, dass es im örtlichen Gefängnis einen Aufstand gab. Es ist gefährlich hier!"
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman stares at you, adjusting her uniform nervously.{/n} "Your... {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? A thousand pardons if I addressed you improperly! Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die junge Frau starrt dich an und richtet sich nervös die Uniform.{/n} "Euer ... {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Ich bitte eintausend Mal um Entschuldigung, wenn ich Euch falsch angesprochen habe! Kommt Ihr im Auftrag von Gouverneur Medineh oder führen Euch andere Angelegenheiten her? Äh ... Falls es Letzteres ist, solltet Ihr wissen, dass es im örtlichen Gefängnis einen Aufstand gab. Es ist gefährlich hier!"

languages.text: {n}La jeune femme vous dévisage en ajustant nerveusement son uniforme.{/n} « Votre... Seigneurie ? Mille excuses si je n'emploie pas la bonne formule de politesse ! Êtes-vous là pour le compte du gouverneur Medineh, ou pour autre chose ? Euh... Si c'est pour autre chose, je préfère vous prévenir : il y a une émeute dans la prison, la situation est assez dangereuse ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman stares at you, adjusting her uniform nervously.{/n} "Your... {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? A thousand pardons if I addressed you improperly! Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La jeune femme vous dévisage en ajustant nerveusement son uniforme.{/n} « Votre... Seigneurie ? Mille excuses si je n'emploie pas la bonne formule de politesse ! Êtes-vous là pour le compte du gouverneur Medineh, ou pour autre chose ? Euh... Si c'est pour autre chose, je préfère vous prévenir : il y a une émeute dans la prison, la situation est assez dangereuse ! »

languages.text: {n}这个年轻女子盯着你，紧张地整理着自己的制服。{/n}“大……大人？如果我的称呼方式不太恰当，请您原谅！您是代表梅迪涅总督来此，还是另有要务？呃……如果您另有要事在身，我得告诉您，当地的监狱发生了暴乱，这里相当危险！”
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman stares at you, adjusting her uniform nervously.{/n} "Your... {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? A thousand pardons if I addressed you improperly! Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个年轻女子盯着你，紧张地整理着自己的制服。{/n}“大……大人？如果我的称呼方式不太恰当，请您原谅！您是代表梅迪涅总督来此，还是另有要务？呃……如果您另有要事在身，我得告诉您，当地的监狱发生了暴乱，这里相当危险！”

languages.text: {n}若い女性は、モジモジと制服を整えながらこちらを見つめる。{/n}「あの…陛下？不適切な呼び方をしていたら、本当に申し訳ありません！メディネ総督の代理でいらっしゃったのですか？それとも別の用事でいらっしゃったのですか？あの…後者であれば、この地の刑務所で暴動が起きていることを知っておいてください。ここは、とても危険なんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman stares at you, adjusting her uniform nervously.{/n} "Your... {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? A thousand pardons if I addressed you improperly! Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

traits.locale_text: {n}若い女性は、モジモジと制服を整えながらこちらを見つめる。{/n}「えっと…陛下？失礼な呼び方だったら本当に本当にごめんなさい！メディネ総督の代理ですか、それとも別の用でこちらに来られたのですか？ええと…後者なら、この場所の刑務所で暴動が起きていることを知っておいてください。ここは、とても危険なんです！」
{n}若い女性は、モジモジと制服を整えながらこちらを見つめる。{/n}「あの…陛下？不適切な呼び方をしていたら、本当に申し訳ありません！メディネ総督の代理でいらっしゃったのですか？それとも別の用事でいらっしゃったのですか？あの…後者であれば、この地の刑務所で暴動が起きていることを知っておいてください。ここは、とても危険なんです！」

languages.text: {n}Genç kadın, üniformasını gergin gergin düzelterek sana bakıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Hitabım uygun değilse binlerce kez özür dilerim! Buraya Vali Medineh adına mı yoksa başka bir amaçla mı gelmiştiniz? Şey... Başka bir amacınız vardıysa hapishanede bir isyan çıktığını belirtmem gerekiyor. Civar epey tehlikeli!"
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman stares at you, adjusting her uniform nervously.{/n} "Your... {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? A thousand pardons if I addressed you improperly! Have you come on behalf of Governor Medineh or are you here on other business? Uh... If it's the latter, you ought to know that there's been a riot at the local prison. It's quite dangerous here!"

Buraya Vali Medineh adına mı yoksa başka bir amaçla mı gelmiştiniz? Şey... Başka bir amacınız vardıysa hapishanede bir isyan çıktığını belirtmem gerekiyor. Civar epey tehlikeli!"
